detail_desc: 3/4-length sports trousers in lightweight, fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and side pockets. Tapered legs with hole-patterned side stripes, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Knee-length jacket in airy, patterned chiffon with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Wrapover front with a tie belt at the waist.

Long-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a small, frilled collar and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Wide flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders to the back. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and cuffs. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Dress in a crinkled organic cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps. Unlined.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave with elastication around the top and decorative buttons down the front. Short sleeves with narrow elastication, and a rounded hem.
Ankle-length pyjama bottoms in soft, airy viscose with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Wide shirt in patterned satin with notch lapels, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with wide cuffs. Contrasting colour trims.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hats in soft cotton jersey. One with an all-over print and one in a solid colour with ears sewn on top.
Turban in a soft knit containing some wool.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on the top, small appliqué at the front, earflaps and ties under the chin. Fleece lining.

Padded parka with a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a lined, detachable hood with a faux fur trim and reflective strip. Off-centre zipped pocket at the top, patch front pockets with a flap, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover, jersey-lined hood and kangaroo pocket. Second layer in contrasting colour jersey at the cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with an angular neckline and short sleeves.

Short kaftan dress woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen. Double stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening and drawstrings at the front and long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Asymmetric seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and drawstrings at the front. Lined in a cotton weave.
Fitted, single-breasted jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Maxi dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps. Gathered, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt with high slits in the sides. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short coat in woven fabric with a tie-belt, V-neck, concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. The tie belt and lining have sections in a contrasting colour. Lined.
Long-sleeved blouse in soft slub cotton jersey with a V-neck, decorative gathers at the shoulders and a yoke at the back.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Cardigan in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Maxi dress in a striped weave with a wide, elasticated neckline and 3/4-length raglan balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Tie belt at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Scarf in a wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 30x250 cm.
Pool shoes with a fabric strap and hook and loop fastening (sizes 7-9 with a strap around the heel). Fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Cigarette trousers woven in a slightly stretchy viscose blend with a regular waist that has a decorative grosgrain bow at the front and wide elastication at the back. Side pockets and tapered legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leather mules with leather insoles and rubber soles.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Flip-flops with plastic straps and fluted ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) soles.

Oversized tunic in a cotton weave with a V-shaped opening at the front and small stand-up collar with narrow ties that can be adjusted with buttons. Low dropped shoulders, long balloon sleeves and wide cuffs with narrow ties and adjustable buttoning. Pleat at the back for added width, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide ribbed waistband containing a concealed key pocket, and legs with ventilating mesh sections.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, V-neck swimsuit with a low-cut back, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft, patterned velour. Concealed zip down the front with a chin guard and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Sleeveless playsuit in a stretch, patterned viscose weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a drawstring hood and long raglan sleeves. Seamless.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with a round neck and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with shaped cups and a halter neck that ties at the back of the neck.
Short dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the top and short cap sleeves. Elasticated seam and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers in a cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Matching, detachable bow tie. Regular-fit trousers in twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Boxy-style top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
Skinny-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft satin with an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly with a button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fitted top in a soft rib-knit viscose blend with a polo neck, short sleeves, short slits in the sides and overlocked edges.

Non-wired lace bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back, an elasticated hem and a hook-and-eye fastening at the front.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Short, flared skirt woven in a wool blend with decorative zigzag seams. High waist with a satin-lined waistband and a concealed zip and concealed hook-and-eye fastener at one side. Box pleat with an inset satin panel front and back, and open back pockets. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and a print motif on the front.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Baby Exclusive. Jumper in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with buttons at the back of the neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Satin top with a V-neck, lace trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sandals with narrow foot straps and fluted soles. Heel 1 cm.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in cotton jersey with a round neckline and dropped shoulders.
Wide top in soft, printed jersey with short, wide dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.
Scarves in patterned satin that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 30x80 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch cotton denim. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. High waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.
Baby Exclusive. Soft toy in soft cotton with polyester filling. Length 21 cm.
Sleeveless, turtleneck body in stretch, ribbed jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Small shoulder bag with a concealed magnetic fastener and a flap with a decorative metal ring. Two-part inner compartment and a shoulder strap with a chain fastening. Lined. Size 5.5x14.5x21.5 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft brushed twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a text print on the front, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and diagonal side seams with a slit at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tube scarf in a cotton knit with ribbed edges. Length 23 cm, circumference approx. 43 cm.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft pima cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey with studs around the neckline and sleeves, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with short butterfly sleeves.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in wide-wale cotton corduroy with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Spacious shopper in soft imitation leather with two handles and a magnetic fastener at the top. Soft brushed inside. Size 16x31x39 cm.
